entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:20 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
